document.title: DYNAMIC LEARNING MAPS ESSENTIAL ELEMENTS FOR English Language Arts

A77709F60E1A4699BAC0941B0DE0EF30.description:
With guidance and support, use words acquired
through conversations, being read to, and during shared
reading activities.

2399A9D7221146D587EF396427BBD92F.description:
With guidance and support, demonstrate an
understanding of common verbs.

41923B09383A4DD797927DDEABEA8C57.description:
With guidance and support, use words to communicate in
real-life situations.

082FFCDEBFF54E6BA8604CD022237B62.description:
With guidance and support, demonstrate understanding
of frequently occurring opposites.

98E766A3F9234255B150CF0BEFE09E6F.description:
With guidance and support, sort common objects into
familiar categories.

BB3890DB112A47F5ACF25F18D15975C6.description:
Demonstrate emerging understanding of word
relationships.

D00BF074B39B49A5AA9C85C0168C7160.description:
With guidance and support, demonstrate understanding
of words used in every day routines.

675C727CA22B4CE199D980B24505753F.description:
Demonstrate emerging knowledge of word
meanings.

DAE96CA3A3EC429CB4919220394D3F78.description:
With guidance and support, link two or more words
together in communication.

C6341FB7B1024515BE82486A87CB34FB.description:
With guidance and support, demonstrate understanding
of common prepositions: on, off, in, out.

C2E6ACC86B7A45149706F34AC1C2324C.description:
With guidance and support, identify answers to simple
questions (e.g., who, what) from an array of choices.

23127118036244A499E88E8C1186EB93.description:
With guidance and support, use frequently occurring
plural nouns.

7EBEF1B0752944B1993350FC24D944CD.description:
With guidance and support, use frequently occurring
nouns in communication.

80C32F169EE746B2A5FF89D57573BA05.description:
With guidance and support, distinguish between letters
and other symbols or shapes.

0157B3C348B4485AB53EF1FFD12FD271.description:
Demonstrate emerging understanding of letter
and word use.

95F81FFCF70F430CBA5108D4AEEA44E5.description:
With guidance and support, communicate
thoughts, feelings, and ideas.

A309FAD78BB34F58944955CFD6D63DAC.description:
With guidance and support, add or select
drawings or other visual or tactual displays that relate to familiar
people, places, things, and events.

C2812EB197AA454C9FF6B208B14485DF.description:
With guidance and support, identify familiar
people, places, things, and events.

6D43F887A24D4707B3786941695C473F.description:
Demonstrate an emerging understanding of a
familiar text read aloud or information presented orally or
through other media by answering questions.

2F3EB2E54A974677A3EFA0C3BADF7B3C.description:
Participate in multiple-turn communication exchanges
with support from adults.

F5A0C52138524546A3C6E8DCA2624F23.description: Communicate directly with supportive adults or peers.

2E6B308E8F6D45D9A2EA1D35C0EBF26E.description:
With guidance and support from adults, identify
information, objects, or events that relate to personal
experiences.

169EAA1046C1471699083F831243D5FC.description:
With guidance and support, participate in shared
research and writing objects.

19D81DDCA9044CDCB0555E435421D2F9.description: Research to Build and Present Knowledge

A306761AF5084397BCFF9E3D6CEA520B.description:
With guidance and support from adults, explore
a variety of digital tools to produce individual or group writing.

B471BC49E1AF4AE8A74770F2C4CBE7A6.description:
With guidance and support, select an event and
use drawing, dictating, or writing and share information about it.

E620497D29A54205A08FAE93616FEAAB.description:
With guidance and support, select a familiar
topic and use drawing, dictating, or writing to share information
about the topic.

10508868A81941FABC6B7EBCDB65F48F.description:
With guidance and support, select a familiar
book and use drawing, dictating, or writing to state an opinion
about it.

250BD20A167F4DCD80C9ED363019ACA5.description:
Engage in purposeful shared reading of familiar
text.

CF214A5C59A24F4B9502ED996CF12792.description:
With guidance and support, recognize environmental
print.

FBCD384BBE824EBEB7C8EB037A361330.description:
With guidance and support, recognize first letter of own
name in print.

B4563E1DD1064E7DA252122C68851058.description:
With guidance and support, identify single-syllable spoken
words with the same onset (beginning sound) as a familiar
word.

1FE8BABCAF204B8D9BB5F74DE276D5C3.description:
With guidance and support, recognize the number of
words in a spoken message.

BD8D2A23797F40EA91E13CBB678A718C.description: With guidance and support, recognize rhyming words.

CD14FF4FF19D47AB9F56F8D3B49D610C.description:
Demonstrate emerging understanding of spoken
words, syllables, and sounds (phonemes).

7BB3020218A8430CA4A16039A0EB8209.description:
With guidance and support during shared reading,
demonstrate understanding that books are read one page
at a time from beginning to end.

7AE574394FC94AE2B67DA24F8FE99CAC.description:
Demonstrate emerging understanding of the
organization of print.

267B607E7AA841F3BCEC64F675F78E97.description:
With guidance and support, actively engage in
shared reading of informational text.

80CDCA3C0AD24F06BA91FF65538F1915.description: Range of Reading and Level of Text Complexity

E29E8CA7E99342F78D2A4791151F456E.description:
With guidance and support, match similar parts
of two familiar texts on the same topic.

FFB86A41010B47FC91EF023CAA0129BE.description:
With guidance and support, identify points the
author makes in an informational text.

B5AAE28F100B481E928581ADD0429A1D.description:
With guidance and support, identify illustrations
or objects/tactual information that go with a familiar text.

F9A55C22F1A54F6A95E2CD671B1850AE.description:
With guidance and support, distinguish between
words and illustrations in an informational text.

EC3243654BF44DCEA60694F10F352096.description:
With guidance and support, identify the front
cover of a book.

97F5CF0CA75D4B32AD9B91E790A4E30D.description:
With guidance and support, indicate when an
unknown word is used in a text.

8677BCF398C04AD5BF616E56B8F07F55.description:
With guidance and support, identify individuals,
events, or details in a familiar informational text.

5098A32B5EA94B2E8611C38F633B110E.description:
With guidance and support, identify the topic of
a familiar text.

69BD98AB680741B9912A65AAF6F0A78B.description:
With guidance and support, identify a detail in a
familiar text.

89A49AE48DDB4961B387EEFB62B2D217.description:
With guidance and support, actively engage
in shared reading.

B83681CFFBE54CE789AA63179C85E2A2.description: Range of Reading and Level of Text Complexity

32186112E9EE47C2B6E5CCF57A0AAAD2.description:
With guidance and support, identify the
adventures or experiences of a character in a familiar story.

A37725DB753748489FBB3F6DC5C5DD78.description:
With guidance and support, identify
illustrations or objects/tactual information that go with a
familiar story.

6E1E04FC368A4DFC9873D24E29B11DFF.description:
With guidance and support, distinguish
between words and illustrations in a story.

E6F2EE0A2C04422BA52190C1B5BA155B.description:
With guidance and support, recognize familiar
texts (e.g., storybooks, poems).

267895476D444F71B1A685941310211D.description:
With guidance and support, indicate when an
unknown word is used in a text.

B58CE3E5889741BF8D53C999A3B05195.description:
With guidance and support, identify
characters and settings in a familiar story.

4D212DC5DAD348729A14902770E8E51B.description:
With guidance and support, identify major
events in familiar stories.

55A0377DFB2E434F9B33FEC4A775F6C5.description:
With guidance and support, identify details in
familiar stories.
